data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Primor‘ye, Russia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Primor‘ye, Russia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Primor'ye prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 68 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Primor‘ye, Russia to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 29,589 believers in Primor'ye, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Nanai, Hezhen people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Primor'ye to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: the state of Primor'ye has (about) 29,589 people who know Jesus, 1,134,856 people who know about him culturally, and 857,454 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Primor‘ye, Russia and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.
